[Collette sighs] What? That's horrid! [Ruth] Oh, my God.

translation.en: you're a really good dancer, are you?

translation.en: because as long as I live, and I've got a lot of years left,

-Let me explain. You'll understand. -Let go of me! [screams]

‎-让我解释一下 你会理解我的

-I haven't found my lead dancer yet. -[bike bell chimes]
David, they're totally on my case about this

I'm just waiting for my takeout.
Doing all right otherwise? Do you need anything?

Has anyone moved into your old store?

You know what will make you feel better?

That's what I'm gonna do. Okay.

While you're home visiting, maybe you could teach a master class?

Because I was thinking, for next year, maybe,

translation.en: here we go. Well, just a little quick...

translation.en: -[boy imitating car engine] -[Sarah] Michelle, sit still.
a very special guest, straight from Broadway,

How old were you when you started dancing?
How does she dance on the beat?
How did you get to dance on Broadway?
-[Barb] Oona. -When they pick people for parts in shows
does the most talented dancer always get the part?

‎-我也想去百老汇

translation.en: Never make a mistake in front of anyone important.

translation.en: You don't really know who the important people are.

translation.en: So, really, you can't make a mistake in front of anyone.

translation.en: And nothing can help you. Nothing.

translation.en: [inhales] You manage to pull that off,
I'd say you have a solid
one percent chance of making it.
Thank you for those inspiring yet realistic words!

My sisters, you know, Sarah and Michelle.

translation.en: Did they wipe your memory while you were in New York?
translation.zh:
‎你在纽约时
‎他们把你的记忆抹掉了吗？

translation.zh: ‎话说 你回老家来干什么？

translation.en: -I'm gonna go rest in my truck. -Yeah.
my grandma has been getting a little forgetful.
So, I've been taking over more with my sisters,

translation.en: on top of my job, and the classes, you know, just doing the grown-up thing.

translation.en: Oh, by the way, your dad

translation.en: is still on me to, uh, fix the barn from the time

translation.en: we, uh, accidentally started that fire.
translation.zh: ‎就因为我们那次不小心弄着了火

translation.en: Since I'm back for a bit,

translation.en: and clearly we're gonna run into each other a lot,
when I ended things, not in the most thoughtful way,

translation.en: -and I-- -"Sorry to do this in a text,
translation.zh:
‎-而且…
‎-“很抱歉要通过短信和你说

translation.en: but we have to break up. Ape."

translation.en: See, it was very thoughtfully worded.

translation.en: I just wanna make sure that if, you know, there are any hard feelings

translation.en: -that we can-- -Oh, April, April, April, April, April.
No, no, no. It's just, uh...
Look, Ape, that was high school.

translation.en: [inhales] Well, anyway, I should get back to the books.
That barn isn't gonna fix itself.
Well, I guess he's over you.

translation.en: At least his skin's cleared up.

translation.en: I don't know. Some dumb dance competition brochure.

‎不知道
‎跳舞比赛手册之类的蠢玩意儿

translation.en: She actually asked me to teach.
Can you believe that? To teach.

translation.en: I'm not gonna teach what I should be doing myself.

‎我本应该自己在跳舞的

We go all the way to Atlantic City.

‎“导师共舞”之舞

translation.en: ♪ And round and round and round we go ♪
Welcome to the first day of the DanceDanceDanceDance

translation.en: We're very excited to have you all here today.

‎我是你们的主持人伯特达文波

translation.en: Judging the finals, are theatrical phenomenon, Welly Wong,
translation.zh: ‎而决赛的评委们有舞剧大佬威利王

translation.en: Best of luck to all our competitors.
♪ And I swore if you hang the phone up On me again ♪
♪ Oh-oh-oh-oh, that'll be the last time ♪
♪ I can't [bleep] believe! I'll never forgive you ♪
[Burt] Waupaca. Way to express your tween angst.

translation.en: Miss April told you two not to practice the Star Lift too much.
translation.zh:
‎艾珀耳小姐告诉过你们两个
‎不要练习星日争辉太久

translation.en: I was afraid you wouldn't let me dance.
-Do we tell them we can't go on or-- -[Dicky] No.
translation.zh:
‎-我们要告诉他们不能上场还是…
‎-不

translation.en: I just have to think of something else they can do instead of the Star Lift.
translation.zh: ‎我得想个其他动作来代替星日争辉

translation.en: [Burt] Next up, New Hope Dance Studio.
All right. Well, everybody take your places. Let's go.
translation.zh: ‎好了 大家去站位吧 去吧

translation.en: Wait! No, strike a pose instead of the lift, okay?
translation.zh: ‎等一下 不要举人了 摆个造型就好

translation.en: Strike a pose instead of the lift!
translation.zh: ‎不要举人了 摆个造型就好

translation.en: It's going well. It's going well.
[April] Don't do the Star Lift, Dicky. Don't do it.
translation.zh: ‎别做这个动作了 迪奇 别做了

translation.en: -[April] What are they doing? -[Barb] Don't know.
[Burt] Coming up is New Hope with their contemporary routine,
translation.zh: ‎接下来是新希望的现代舞环节

translation.en: led by their teacher, April Dibrina.
translation.zh: ‎由他们的导师艾珀耳迪布利纳领舞

translation.en: Let's see if they can impress Broadway's Welly Wong.
translation.zh:
‎看看他们是否能够
‎给百老汇的威利王留下印象

translation.en: We are almost up. The girls are waiting,
translation.zh: ‎我们马上就要上场了 女孩们在等你

translation.en: and Miss Barb looks like she's about to pass a kidney stone.
translation.zh:
‎芭柏太太看起来就像是
‎要尿出肾结石一样

translation.en: Wait. All those times in front of paying audiences,
translation.zh:
‎你在花钱买票的观众面前
‎表演过那么多次

translation.en: Nick, I was just in the chorus.
translation.zh: ‎尼克 我那时只是伴舞的而已

translation.en: No one was ever looking at me.
And now, everyone is counting on me.
The girls, my dad, the town,
translation.zh: ‎女孩儿们 我爸爸 整个镇子

translation.en: and I can't let everyone down.
Hey, how could you possibly let anyone down?
What you've done for everyone? It's amazing.
translation.zh: ‎你为所有人做的一切 ‎真的很棒

translation.en: You know when you told me that you came to New York after I sent you "The Text"?
translation.zh:
‎还记得那次你告诉我 ‎在我给你发了短信后
‎你来纽约找我吗？

translation.en: I really wish I'd seen you that day.
[Burt] Next up, New Hope Teacher Feature.
translation.zh: ‎接下来是新希望舞蹈团的导师共舞

translation.en: -[Kari] Whoo! We made it! -We're in the final round!
translation.zh: ‎我们做到了！ ‎我们进入最后一轮了！

translation.en: [Dicky] We did it! We crushed it!
[Barb] They loved the Teacher Feature. We made it!
translation.zh:
‎他们超爱导师共舞环节
‎我们做到了！

translation.en: -Just like I taught you. -Just like you taught me.
translation.zh:
‎-就像我教你的那样
‎-就像你教我的

translation.en: April! I have to run back to take care of an emergency but...
translation.zh: ‎艾珀耳 我得回去处理个急事

translation.en: can I steal you away for a moment? I have a proposition for you.
translation.zh: ‎不过能不能借一步说话？ ‎我有个提议

translation.en: I will catch up with you guys.
[Barb] Okay, all right, well, notes in the dressing room, everybody. Come on.
translation.zh:
‎好了 我要在更衣室讲几句
‎大家快来吧

translation.en: This couldn't have worked out more perfectly, right?
translation.zh: ‎这一切简直太完美了 不是吗？

translation.en: I was just coming to find you, um--
I'm headed back to New York.
Welly Wong offered me a part in his new show.
translation.zh: ‎威利王让我去演出他的新剧

translation.en: And I have to be at rehearsals now.
I'll tell him you'll be right out.
But this whole thing was your idea. You made a commitment.
translation.zh:
‎可这一切都是你的主意
‎你承诺过的

translation.en: I know. But what am I supposed to do?
translation.zh: ‎我知道 可我又能怎么办？

translation.en: Sarah, I've dreamt of this my whole life.
translation.zh: ‎莎拉 这是我一辈子的梦想

translation.en: [scoffs] That was the plan the whole time, wasn't it?
translation.zh: ‎你一开始就这样计划的 是吗？

translation.en: You just wanted to use the stupid little girls
translation.zh: ‎你只想利用我们这些愚蠢的小女孩

translation.en: so you could claw your way back to Broadway.
I knew it. I knew it the whole time. You're just a selfish jerk!
translation.zh:
‎我就知道 我一直都知道
‎你就是个自私的混蛋

translation.en: [scoffs] Okay, you don't care about anyone but yourself!
translation.zh: ‎好吧 你只关心你自己而已

translation.en: Yes! Do you want me to-- Oh, this? Okay. Ready? One, two, three!
translation.zh:
‎你想让我…这个吗？
‎好了 准备好了吗？一、二、三

translation.en: Everybody. Everybody, attention, please. Andrew, Michael, ladies.
translation.zh: ‎大家请注意 安德鲁 麦克 女士们

translation.en: This is our Whirly Girl, April.
translation.zh: ‎这就是我们的旋转女孩艾珀耳

translation.en: Let's all give her a warm welcome.
♪ It looks as if I stumbled Right into the palm of your hand ♪
[April] I'm doing the right thing, right?
translation.zh: ‎我做的选择是对的 是吗？

translation.en: Well, sweetheart, you've been busting your ass at this for quite a long time.
translation.zh:
‎亲爱的
‎你为获得这样的机会忙碌已久了

translation.en: I mean, I finally got my dream.
translation.zh: ‎我是说 我终于实现了梦想

translation.en: That's the problem with being a perfectionist.
translation.zh:
‎要做完美主义者
‎就要面对这样的问题

translation.en: You know, I keep telling myself.
This is what I'm supposed to do.
You do what your gut tells you to do.
translation.zh: ‎你要做自己内心想做的事情

translation.en: And if there's any part of you that thinks
that making a big splash on Broadway is suddenly gonna bring your mom back,
translation.zh:
‎在百老汇成为大明星
‎能够让你妈妈突然回心转意

translation.en: There's nothing you can do to bring her back.
translation.zh: ‎无论怎样 你都不会让她回来了

translation.en: Because it wasn't your fault that she left in the first place.
translation.zh: ‎因为她最初离开也并不是你的错
‎所以无论你做什么样的决定

translation.en: just make sure that it makes you feel good about who you are.
translation.zh:
‎只要确保这能
‎让你成为自己想成为的人就可以了

translation.en: it's what I've always wanted to be.
I didn't say "what you are," I said "who."
translation.zh:
‎我没说“想做的事”
‎我是说“想成为的人”

translation.en: And I can think of nine little reasons
why it wouldn't be so stupid.
We'll start scene work in five minutes.
Mr. Wong. I'm sorry, Mr. Wong, but I have to go back to the competition.
translation.zh: ‎王先生 很抱歉 ‎但我必须回去参加比赛

translation.en: If that means that you have to give my part to someone else,
translation.zh: ‎如果这意味着你要把我的角色给别人

translation.en: I understand. I mean, I don't want you to,
translation.zh: ‎我能理解 虽然我并不希望这样

translation.en: because I think you need someone who honors their commitments.
translation.zh:
‎因为我想
‎你也需要一个能信守承诺的人

translation.en: And you see, that's exactly why I have to go, because...
I have nine little kids that I committed to.
translation.zh: ‎我还有九个小朋友在等着我

translation.en: You know, I have a whole town that's counting on me.
They're in the first group after lunch,
-but I can't find them. -Okay, I'm on my way back.
translation.zh:
‎-但我找不到他们
‎-好 我现在回去

translation.en: -You'll never make it in time! -Get them ready. I'll be there. Promise!
translation.zh:
‎-你是赶不到的
‎-让他们准备好 我会到的 我保证

translation.en: You couldn't have asked to borrow his limo?
Just admit it. You love me.
-[Deco] You owe me gas money. -[April] To Atlantic City!
[over PA] Hi, I'm Burt Davenport, and we continue on
translation.zh: ‎大家好 我是伯特达文波 ‎我们继续第二天的比赛！

translation.en: with day two of our competition!
-Next up, number 44. -Oh, my gosh. Oh, my gosh.
-[April] Goodbye, yep! -Go! Run! You can make it! Go!
translation.zh:
‎-再见！
‎-快去吧 你能赶上的！

translation.en: -[Burt] This is the final countdown... -Excuse me, coming through.
translation.zh:
‎-这是最后倒数…
‎-不好意思 借过一下

translation.en: Oh, my gosh! Oh, my gosh! Oh, my gosh!
I don't know. I was panicking. I said to Ruby, I was like, "Find them,"
translation.zh:
‎我不知道 我刚才很慌
‎就和鲁比说：“去找他们”

translation.en: but I wasn't-- I didn't specifically say like,
translation.zh: ‎但我没有…我没有特别说清楚

translation.en: Hurry, we are in our final countdown.
translation.zh: ‎快一点 我们被催上台了

translation.en: Yeah, I wonder who's in the audience this time?
translation.zh: ‎是啊 不知道这次观众席里又有谁？

translation.en: What happened to your amazing job?
Look, you have every right to hate me, but you earned this.
translation.zh: ‎你们完全有理由恨我 ‎但这次机会是你们努力得来的

translation.en: So, please don't sit out on this just because you wanna get back at me.
translation.zh: ‎所以请不要为了报复我而搞砸比赛

translation.en: When I first met you, all I saw were flaws.
translation.zh:
‎我刚见到你们的时候
‎我只看到了一堆缺点

translation.en: And then I realized, that's exactly what makes you spectacular.
translation.zh:
‎然后我意识到
‎正是这一点让你们变得更特别

translation.en: All those beautiful quirks and imperfections.
translation.zh: ‎所有这些美好的小怪癖和不完美

translation.en: And I'm so sorry that I left.
[April] It just-- It took me a second...
How come you're not yelling at us?
I want you to know how proud I am of all of you.
translation.zh:
‎我想让你们知道
‎我有多么以你们为骄傲

translation.en: You've all become the most beautiful dancers.
translation.zh: ‎你们都成为了最棒的舞蹈家

translation.en: ...Dance Studio, last call. You have one minute to be on stage
translation.zh: ‎新希望舞蹈团 你们还剩一分钟上台
‎哭哭啼啼的自怨自艾感到厌恶

translation.en: Now, this is not how I trained you.
So, put on your big-girl pants.
translation.zh: ‎快点给我摆出大姑娘的样子

translation.en: You too, Dicky. You get on that stage,
translation.zh: ‎迪奇 你也是 快点上台

translation.en: You have till the count of five. One.
Oh, you thought I was being tough on you before.
translation.zh: ‎别以为我之前对你们很苛刻

translation.en: Oh, no, I was just getting started.
Yeah, that's what I thought. Three!
-Step aside. Fierceness is coming through. -[audience applauding]
translation.zh: ‎闪一边去 厉害的家伙来了

translation.en: You better kick butt, or I'll kick yours!
translation.zh:
‎你们最好给他们点厉害看看
‎不然我不会放过你们

translation.en: I don't think he's out there, honey.
Gordy told me he took off when he heard you were back.
translation.zh: ‎高迪说 他听说你要回来后就离开了

translation.en: [April] "Sorry to do this in a text."
You're so-- What did I tell you?
-You have to hold it away from your face. -Sorry.
translation.zh:
‎-你的脸要离远一点才行
‎-抱歉

translation.en: -I'm just gonna see every pore. -Okay, well--
translation.zh:
‎-不然我连每个毛孔都能看到
‎-好吧

translation.en: Listen, I got some bad news. That barn's roof is leaking.
translation.zh: ‎听着 有个坏消息 ‎仓棚的屋顶在漏雨

translation.en: I mean, so much worse than my studio.
-Well, I asked Nick to repair it and-- -Whoa, hold on.
translation.zh: ‎我让尼克去修 然后… ‎等一下

translation.en: Okay, in my defense, I said we should replace, not repair.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 我得辩解一下
‎我说我们应该换个屋顶 而不是修理

translation.en: Well, anyway, we canceled class. Okay, bye.
translation.zh:
‎不管怎么说 我们把课取消了
‎好吧 再见

translation.en: Hang on. Hang on. That's not the agreement.
translation.zh: ‎等下 我们之前不是这么说的

translation.en: I teach class over FaceTime. They do what I say.
translation.zh: ‎我通过视频来教课 他们按我说的做

translation.en: I fly back every Sunday. They do what I say.
translation.zh: ‎我每周日飞回去 他们照我说的做

translation.en: I don't really care if there's three feet of water and they have to swim.
translation.zh:
‎我可不管水漏得有多深
‎哪怕游泳也得练

translation.en: [Barb] I know. We gotta beat the Royaltons next year.
translation.zh: ‎我知道 明年我们还得赢罗亚尔顿呢

translation.en: Well, I'll get them all together and call you when I have them.
translation.zh: ‎我会召集他们的 ‎集合好再打给你

translation.en: Come in. Oh, Mr. Wong. Hi.
I have some notes. A couple tweaks.
translation.zh: ‎我记了一些需要改正的小问题

translation.en: they said somebody's waiting for you in the theater.
What are you guys doing here?
Well, you asked me to get everyone together.
translation.zh: ‎是你让我把大家集合在一起的

translation.en: [stammers] How did you guys afford this?
[Welly] Discussion for later. I will call you next week.
translation.zh: ‎这件事稍后再聊 ‎我下周再打给你

translation.en: Improve your listening skills. I said I'd call you next week.
translation.zh:
‎你要练习一下自己的听力
‎我说了 下周再打给你

translation.en: So, what are we gonna do now?
[April] We're having an opening night dance party.
translation.zh: ‎我们要举办一个首演跳舞派对
